text: varu ila antaru: "Okavela nito patu memu kuda i margadarsakatvanni avalambiste! Memu ma bhumi nundiye paradrolabadatamu." Emi? Memu varini santiki nilayamaina oka pavitra sthalam (makka) lo sthiranivasamu nosangi variki ma taraphu nundi jivanopadhiga anni rakala phalalanu samakurcaleda? Kani vastavaniki varilo cala mandiki idi teliyadu
